extendedInfo.description: Unit Converter - conversion tool. This is a well designed, quick and easy to use unit conversion application. So far we have added 18 unit categories.Features:Can be moved to SD Card. âReverse Unitsâ button to easily switch the measurements. Instant calculation, so no convert button. Remembers last conversion for each category for easier use. Settings to choose the precision of the answer. Over 1300 units in 18 categories. Well designed interface. Smaller size, so doesn't fill up memory. This app comprises the following unit conversions...Acceleration ConverterAngle ConverterArea ConverterData Size ConverterDensity ConverterEnergy ConverterForce ConverterFrequency ConverterLength ConverterPower ConverterPressure ConverterSpeed ConverterTemperature ConverterTime ConverterTorque ConverterTypography ConverterVolume ConverterWeight ConverterWe will be enhancing this converter to include any units as well as any other features you want. Just let us know!Please add a review for this app, to let us know how we can continue to improve this unit converter.Tags: Unit conversion app, unit convertor, Acceleration conversion, Angle conversion, Area conversion, Data Size conversion, Density conversion, Energy conversion, Force conversion, Frequency conversion, Length conversion, Power conversion, Pressure conversion, Speed conversion, Temperature conversion, Time conversion, Torque conversion, Torque conversion, Volume conversion, Weight conversion applications unit conversions change between units, unit converters, unit convertor, unit convertors, units converter units convertor simple unit converter tool unit conversion application unit convertor pro unit conversion plus units conversion free best unit converter metrics conversion units
